node.excerpt: Motivation A Spray of Plum Blossoms (一剪梅), or better known as Xue Hua Piao Piao Bei Feng Xiao Xiao, has become of the latest Internet memes. My dad is a big fan of the original singer of the song and enjoys singing this song a lot. I thought it would…

frontmatter.title: Xue Hua Piao Piao
frontmatter.spoiler: I made a cover song with the virtual singer AiKO
